definitions: relating to or characteristic of alchemy, the medieval forerunner of chemistry concerned with the transmutation of matter

examples.text: he immersed himself in alchemical experiments to create gold

shortDefinitions: relating to or characteristic of alchemy

definitions: involving a seemingly magical process of transformation, creation, or combination

examples.text: writing a novel is an alchemical task
something alchemical occurs as we read these books

shortDefinitions: involving seemingly magical process of transformation
